name: waxes, paraffinic, refined, derived from petroleum based or synthetic hydrocarbon feedstocks, low viscosity
Restrictions: Not to be used for articles in contact with fatty foods for which simulant D1 and/or D2 is laid down.Average molecular weight not less than 350 Da. Viscosity at 100 °C not less than 2,5 cSt (2,5 × 10-6 m2/s). Content of hydrocarbons with Carbon number less than 25, not more than 40 % (w/w).
